name: Boston Fern
shortDescription: A lush, feathery fern ideal for hanging baskets and humid spaces.
description: Boston Ferns are graceful plants that bring a lush, tropical vibe to indoor spaces. They love humidity and indirect light, making them perfect for bathrooms or shaded balconies.

plantCareTips: Place in partial sunlight or filtered light.
Keep soil consistently moist but not soggy.
Fertilize monthly during growing season.
Protect from strong winds or harsh sun.
name: Mandevilla
shortDescription: A tropical climber with large trumpet-shaped pink flowers.
description: Mandevilla is a beautiful flowering climber known for its vibrant, trumpet-shaped blooms and lush foliage. It's ideal for trellises and patios, thriving in partial sun and needing regular watering for best results.

plantCareTips: Needs 4-6 hours of direct sunlight daily.
Water when top 2 inches of soil is dry.
Stake support may be required during flowering.
Pinch tips to encourage bushier growth.
name: Hibiscus
shortDescription: A classic flowering plant with bold, red blossoms.
description: Hibiscus is a tropical plant producing large, stunning flowers that attract pollinators. It flourishes in sunlight and well-drained soil, making it ideal for gardens and patios.

plantCareTips: Keep in bright, indirect sunlight for best color.
Water when topsoil feels dry to the touch.
Trim regularly to promote bushy growth.
Avoid soggy soil to prevent root rot.
name: Wandering Jew
shortDescription: A striking trailing plant with purple and green striped leaves.
description: The Wandering Jew plant is a fast-growing, easy-care trailing plant perfect for hanging baskets or pots. Its vibrant purple-striped leaves add a touch of color to any space. It thrives in indirect sunlight and needs moderate watering.

plantCareTips: Water once a week
Indirect sunlight
name: Snake Plantt
shortDescription: Air purifying, low maintenance
description: Ideal for indoors, filters air toxins
